SELECT M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, MD.MEMBER_ID, CASE WHEN MD.MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '관심있음' ELSE NULL END AS INTEREST_STATUS, T.ratio, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_DIBS MD ON M.MOVIE_CODE = MD.MOVIE_DIBS_OBJECT AND MD.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} LEFT JOIN ( WITH totalseatcount AS( SELECT SUM(KPAY_SEAT_CNT) as totalseat FROM kakao_pay INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE ON kakao_pay.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = THEATER_SCHEDULE.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON THEATER_SCHEDULE.MOVIE_CODE = MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE WHERE kakao_pay.pg_token IS NOT NULL and THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY and THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' ), movieseatcount AS( SELECT SUM(KPAY_SEAT_CNT) as movieseat, MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE FROM kakao_pay INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE ON kakao_pay.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = THEATER_SCHEDULE.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON THEATER_SCHEDULE.MOVIE_CODE = MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE WHERE kakao_pay.pg_token IS NOT NULL AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY and THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' GROUP BY MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE ) SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, sub.* FROM (SELECT ROUND(NVL((movieseatcount.movieseat / totalseatcount.totalseat) * 100,0),1) AS ratio, m.* FROM totalseatcount, movieseatcount RIGHT JOIN MOVIE m ON movieseatcount.MOVIE_CODE = m.MOVIE_CODE ) sub ) T ON M.MOVIE_CODE = T.MOVIE_CODE WHERE M.MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중' ORDER BY ratio DESC

WITH totalseatcount AS ( SELECT SUM(KPAY_SEAT_CNT) AS totalseat FROM kakao_pay INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE ON kakao_pay.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = THEATER_SCHEDULE.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON THEATER_SCHEDULE.MOVIE_CODE = MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE WHERE kakao_pay.pg_token IS NOT NULL AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' ), movieseatcount AS ( SELECT SUM(KPAY_SEAT_CNT) AS movieseat, MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE FROM kakao_pay INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE ON kakao_pay.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = THEATER_SCHEDULE.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON THEATER_SCHEDULE.MOVIE_CODE = MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE WHERE kakao_pay.pg_token IS NOT NULL AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' GROUP BY MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE ) SELECT M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, T.ratio, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND(NVL((movieseatcount.movieseat / totalseatcount.totalseat) * 100,0),1) AS ratio, m.MOVIE_CODE FROM totalseatcount, movieseatcount RIGHT JOIN MOVIE m ON movieseatcount.MOVIE_CODE = m.MOVIE_CODE ORDER BY ratio DESC ) T ON M.MOVIE_CODE = T.MOVIE_CODE WHERE M.MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중' ORDER BY ratio DESC

WITH totalseatcount AS ( SELECT SUM(KP.KPAY_SEAT_CNT) AS totalseat FROM kakao_pay KP INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE TS ON KP.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE M ON TS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE WHERE KP.PG_TOKEN IS NOT NULL AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' ), movieseatcount AS ( SELECT SUM(KP.KPAY_SEAT_CNT) AS movieseat, M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE FROM kakao_pay KP INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE TS ON KP.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE M ON TS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE WHERE KP.PG_TOKEN IS NOT NULL AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' GROUP BY M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE ) SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ROUND(NVL((movieseatcount.movieseat / totalseatcount.totalseat) * 100, 0), 1) AS ratio, M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, MD.MEMBER_ID, CASE WHEN MD.MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '관심있음' ELSE NULL END AS INTEREST_STATUS FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN movieseatcount ON M.MOVIE_CODE = movieseatcount.MOVIE_CODE CROSS JOIN totalseatcount LEFT JOIN MOVIE_DIBS MD ON M.MOVIE_CODE = MD.MOVIE_DIBS_OBJECT AND MD.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} WHERE M.MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'
ORDER BY ratio DESC

WITH totalseatcount AS ( SELECT SUM(KP.KPAY_SEAT_CNT) AS totalseat FROM kakao_pay KP INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE TS ON KP.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE M ON TS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE WHERE KP.PG_TOKEN IS NOT NULL AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' ), movieseatcount AS ( SELECT SUM(KP.KPAY_SEAT_CNT) AS movieseat, M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE FROM kakao_pay KP INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE TS ON KP.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE M ON TS.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE WHERE KP.PG_TOKEN IS NOT NULL AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' GROUP BY M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE ) SELECT ROWNUM AS RNUM, ROUND(NVL((movieseatcount.movieseat / totalseatcount.totalseat) * 100, 0), 1) AS ratio, M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN movieseatcount ON M.MOVIE_CODE = movieseatcount.MOVIE_CODE CROSS JOIN totalseatcount WHERE M.MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'
ORDER BY ratio DESC
SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_SCREEN, MOVIE_POSTER, MOVIE_STILL, MOVIE_PLOT, MOVIE_OPENDATE, MOVIE_GRADE FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중'
SELECT MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_SCREEN FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영종료'

SELECT M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_GRADE, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, M.MOVIE_GENRE, M.MOVIE_RUNTIME, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_ACTORS, M.MOVIE_CODE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW MR WHERE MR.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM MOVIE M WHERE MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode}

SELECT M.MOVIE_CODE, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, M.MOVIE_DIRECTOR, M.MOVIE_ACTORS, M.MOVIE_GENRE, M.MOVIE_RUNTIME, MD.MEMBER_ID, CASE WHEN MD.MEMBER_ID IS NOT NULL THEN '관심있음' ELSE NULL END AS INTEREST_STATUS, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW MR WHERE MR.MOVIE_CODE = M.MOVIE_CODE ) AS REVIEW_COUNT FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN MOVIE_DIBS MD ON M.MOVIE_CODE = MD.MOVIE_DIBS_OBJECT AND MD.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} WHERE M.MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode}

SELECT R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM, R.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_STAR, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_CONTENT, R.MOVIE_CODE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_REG_DATE, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE L WHERE L.MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_OBJECT = R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM) AS MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_CNT, (SELECT MOVIE_TITLE FROM MOVIE WHERE MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode}) AS MOVIE_TITLE FROM MOVIE_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID WHERE R.MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode} ORDER BY MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_CNT DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_REVIEW (MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM, MEMBER_ID, MOVIE_REVIEW_STAR, MOVIE_REVIEW_CONTENT, MOVIE_CODE, MOVIE_REVIEW_REG_DATE) VALUES(movie_review_seq.nextval, #{memberId} , #{star} , #{reviewText}, #{movieCode}, sysdate)
mapper.select: select * from (select rownum rnum, r.* from ( SELECT R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM, R.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_PROFILE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_STAR, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_CONTENT, R.MOVIE_CODE, R.MOVIE_REVIEW_REG_DATE, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MEMBER_NAME, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE L WHERE L.MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_OBJECT = R.MOVIE_REVIEW_NUM) AS MOVIE_REVIEW_LIKE_CNT, COUNT(*) OVER () AS review_cnt FROM MOVIE_REVIEW R LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON R.MEMBER_ID = M.MEMBER_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON R.MOVIE_CODE = MOVIE.MOVIE_CODE) r where rownum < = #{end} ) where rnum > = #{start} and rnum < = #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOVIE_REVIEW

WITH totalseatcount AS ( SELECT SUM(KPAY_SEAT_CNT) AS totalseat FROM kakao_pay INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE ON kakao_pay.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = THEATER_SCHEDULE.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON THEATER_SCHEDULE.movie_Code = MOVIE.movie_Code WHERE kakao_pay.pg_token IS NOT NULL AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' ), movieseatcount AS ( SELECT SUM(KPAY_SEAT_CNT) AS movieseat, MOVIE.movie_Code, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE FROM kakao_pay INNER JOIN THEATER_SCHEDULE ON kakao_pay.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = THEATER_SCHEDULE.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID INNER JOIN MOVIE ON THEATER_SCHEDULE.movie_Code = MOVIE.movie_Code WHERE kakao_pay.pg_token IS NOT NULL AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE = TO_DATE(#{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') - INTERVAL '1' DAY AND THEATER_SCHEDULE_STATUS = '종료' GROUP BY MOVIE.movie_Code, MOVIE.MOVIE_TITLE ) SELECT M.movie_Code, M.MOVIE_TITLE, M.MOVIE_SCREEN, M.MOVIE_POSTER, M.MOVIE_STILL, M.MOVIE_PLOT, M.MOVIE_OPENDATE, M.MOVIE_GRADE, T.ratio, ROWNUM AS RNUM FROM MOVIE M LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ROUND(NVL((movieseatcount.movieseat / totalseatcount.totalseat) * 100,0),1) AS ratio, m.movie_Code FROM totalseatcount, movieseatcount RIGHT JOIN MOVIE m ON movieseatcount.movie_Code = m.movie_Code ORDER BY ratio DESC ) T ON M.movie_Code = T.movie_Code WHERE M.MOVIE_SCREEN = '상영중' AND M.movie_Code = #{movieCode} ORDER BY ratio DESC

WITH totalcount as( SELECT TS.MOVIE_CODE, SUM(KP.KPAY_SEAT_CNT) as sumtotal FROM THEATER_SCHEDULE TS JOIN KAKAO_PAY KP ON KP.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID = TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_ID WHERE KP.PG_TOKEN IS NOT NULL AND TS.THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE <= #{THEATER_SCHEDULE_DATE} GROUP BY TS.MOVIE_CODE ) select ROWNUM AS RNUM, sub.* from ( select NVL(totalcount.sumtotal,0) AS rate, m.* from totalcount right join MOVIE m on totalcount.MOVIE_CODE = m.MOVIE_CODE WHERE m.MOVIE_CODE = #{movieCode} ORDER BY rate desc ) sub
